headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Discounts
content:
Considering the boom on the city’s black market, there’s a range of discounts for Biker Businesses and properties relevant to those sorts of criminal pursuits, including 40% off Biker Club Houses and 50% off Turbo Tuning on all Motorcycles. As well as a range of vehicles, both two-wheeled and not, including:

- Declasse Voodoo Custom - 60% off
- Pegassi Vortex - 50% off
- Nagasaki Stryder - 50% off
- Hakuchou Drag - 40% off

And More! Check out the Rockstar Newswire for more details.
